intro: You awaken at the edge of an untamed land. Beyond lies a world of winding forests, hidden ruins, and darkened caves. You are the wanderer. Your choices carve the path.

desc.default: A shadowy grove with whispering leaves.
A moss-covered ruin, half-buried in earth.
A cliff overlooking a misty valley.
A quiet meadow with wildflowers.
The edge of a dark forest looms ahead.
A bubbling brook crossing your path.
An abandoned campsite with a smoldering fire pit.
desc.night: The fire pit glows faintly in the darkness; shadows twist strangely.

event.name: Rusty Sword
event.description: A half-buried sword, dull but serviceable.

choices.result: You now have a Rusty Sword.
You leave the sword where it lies.

desc.default: A dark cave mouth yawns before you.

event.name: Wild Wolf
event.description: A wolf emerges from the underbrush, eyes glinting.

choices.result: You defeat the wolf but sustain a minor injury.
You escape safely but lose your way.

desc.default: A narrow footbridge over a rushing stream.
Thick brambles block your path.
Thick underbrush makes progress slow.
A serene pond reflects the sky above.
A mossy cave entrance leads underground.
A clearing with scattered animal bones.
A rocky hill overlooks the distant valley.
A muddy trail winds between towering oaks.
A hidden alcove with strange carvings.
A foggy glade with eerie silence.
A small waterfall cascades into a crystal pool.
A narrow canyon opens ahead.
A dense thicket blocks your progress.
A quiet glade with soft moss underfoot.
A crumbling stone tower looms ahead.
A shallow stream winds through rocks.
The forest thickens, shadows deep and dark.
